text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's evening, and I'm in my room<n>crafting a plan to help
Nature beat<n>Tokai Teio at the Tracen Meet.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Uma Attack! Good evening, it's your<n>beloved trainee!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Sorry for coming by so late, Trainer. I<n>forgot some stuff in
the trainer office,<n>sooo... mind lending me the keys?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Oh yeah, it'd be a hassle to return<n>them tonight, so I'll
unlock the room<n>for you tomorrow.
choice_data_list: It's already late, so why don't we go together?
It's already late, so why don't we go together?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Ah, um, that's...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I-I'll be f-fine! Just who do you take<n>me for? I'm not a
damsel in distress,<n>y'know?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: That's that, so hurry it up! Gimme the<n>keys already.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm a little curious about the way<n>Nature is acting, but I hand
the keys<n>over to her anyway.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: My thanks! And with that, a good<n>night to you, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: A few hours later...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: R-r-r-ring!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Hello? Is this Nature's trainer? This is<n>Fuji Kiseki, dorm
leader of Ritto<n>Dormitory, speaking.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
It's already an hour past curfew, but<n>Nature hasn't come
back yet. Would<n>you have any ideas as to where she<n>
might be?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There's no time to panic! First, I<n>should check the trainer's
office!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I run through the dimly-lit academy,<n>finally arriving in front of
the trainer's<n>office.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Coming around from the outside is<n>none other than Tokai
Teio! It's the<n>final stretch!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Tokai Teio leaps into the front! She<n>breaks out of the pack...
and across<n>the line! Winning by two whole<n>lengths, Tokai
Teio takes home the<n>gold!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Opening the door, I find Nature staring<n>intently at footage of
Tokai Teio.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Yawn... O-o-ow... neck... stiff.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Still... win after win after win. Her<n>positioning near the end
there was<n>flawless—practically textbook.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Once she gets into her groove,<n>there's no stopping her...
Yikes, I'm<n>getting the heebie-jeebies.
choice_data_list: Are you researching Teio by yourself?
Are you researching Teio by yourself?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huh? Wh-whooooa?!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: T-Trainer! N-no way—why're you<n>here?!
choice_data_list: I got a call from your dorm leader.
I got a call from your dorm leader.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: From Fuji?! Why did she... Ahhh! The<n>curfew!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Augh, I totally lost track of the time. Oh<n>man, that's so dumb!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Looks like she got sucked into<n>researching Tokai Teio and
didn't<n>realize it was this late already.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Um... Sorry about lying to you earlier.<n>Here's the key. I'll go
apologize to<n>Fuji too.
choice_data_list: You want to beat Tokai Teio, don't you?
You want to beat Tokai Teio, don't you?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Nah, it's not—

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...It's not that simple.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I told you plenty of times, haven't I?<n>That... I'm not built like
the others.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With a hint of frustration in her tone,<n>Nature slowly walks
towards the<n>window before gazing up at the night<n>sky.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I'm not like those dazzling stars—I<n>can't shine like they do.
I'm not the<n>main character of this story.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Of course, there was a time when I<n>thought I was, y'know?
I wouldn't<n>have come to Tracen otherwise.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: But now... I know the the cold, hard<n>truth.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
No matter how fast I run, there's<n>always someone out there
who's<n>faster.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Everyone cheered me on—even threw<n>me a send-off fit for
a queen. But<n>when I'm next to real stars, there's<n>no way
I can compare to their<n>radiance.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
To put it simply, I'm just one of those<n>extras you see all the
time in movies.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I'm not cut out for the leading role... I<n>know that better than
anyone.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
An extra like me has no business<n>aiming for first... It's
pathetic, isn't it?
choice_data_list: You're not pathetic in the slightest.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
choice_data_list:
When you give it your all, you shine brighter
than any other star.

When you give it your all, you shine brighter
than any other star.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...I-I can't shine like the others. So<n>stop it, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Please... just stop.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She speaks firmly, but when I look at<n>her, her eyes seem to
waver. Perhaps<n>my words reached her?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After some time, we go back to<n>Nature's dorm and
apologize to Fuji<n>Kiseki together.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The next day, after training...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Trainer? After this, you mind if I<n>check out some Teio
footage again?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Oh, um, don't get me wrong, okay?<n>It's not because I'm
super pumped<n>about facing Teio. Not even close.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: It's just... well...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Even if first place is out of reach...<n>even if victory is
impossible... I-I still<n>want to say that I tried my best...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Mhm. Well, let's get going!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so, the two us begin dedicating<n>every waking moment
to training for<n>the upcoming Tracen Meet.
